subject: College Athletics
Wrestling
Olympic Games
Olympic Games (2016)
Olympic Games (2020)
lead_paragraph: With the International Olympic Committee’s recommendation to drop wrestling from the 2020 Games, college wrestlers are on notice. The 2016 Games could be their only chance at gold.
snippet: With the International Olympic Committee’s recommendation to drop wrestling from the 2020 Games, college wrestlers are on notice. The 2016 Games could be their only chance at gold.
